divs: Sighting Details4 army privates driving car at night on rural road from san antonio back to Camp Bullis. their engine unexpectadly died and everything electrical faded out. They also saw a car up ahead which was simultaneously experiencing the same. Then, a large UFO was seen over the tree tops at a height of approx. 100 feet moving slowly from left to right. as ufo got farther away, electrical activity gradually resumed. CAR
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around November 5th 1957
Summary: 4 army private driving at night on rural road saw large UFO which caused vehicle interference
